virtual-sensor.name: Rooftop_DozerRssi_mapped_demuxed_1385
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerRssiMsg) from Rooftop deployment in usable form

address.predicate: select GENERATION_TIME, POSITION, SENSORTYPE, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, PAYLOAD_RSSI_ID0, PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 from Rooftop_DozerRssi_mapped_1385 where PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 != 65535

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, POSITION, SENSORTYPE, HEADER_SEQNR as SEQUENCE_NUMBER, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as NODE_ID, PAYLOAD_RSSI_ID0 as RSSI_NODE_ID, PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 as RSSI from wrapper
